channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For those with addiction, going into and coming out of prison can be a minefield.
item.description: Many jails and prisons around the country don't provide medication treatment for opioid use disorder. Studies show that medication makes recovery more...

item.title: How Is Your County Spending Opioid Settlement Cash? Our New Tool Follows the Money.

item.title: Trump struck deals with 16 drug companies. But they're still raising prices this year
item.description: All 16 drug companies that inked deals with the Trump administration over the past few months still raised some of their prices for 2026.

item.title: This hospice has a bold new mission: saving lives
item.description: A hospice in Uganda asked itself: Can we do more than ease the pain of dying? Can we actually prevent deaths from cervical and breast cancer?

item.title: Native American Leaders Target High Maternal Mortality in Indian Country
item.description: Get our weekly newsletter, The Week in Brief, featuring a roundup of our original coverage, Fridays at 2 p.m. ET.

item.title: Kaiser Permanente To Pay $556 Million in Record Medicare Advantage Fraud Settlement
item.description: Kaiser Permanente agrees to pay $556 million to settle allegations of billing the government for conditions patients didn’t have.
